subject: Re: Bestellung #SSN1845 bestätigt
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,


I hope this message finds you well.


I would like to request the cancellation of my recent order for the Simsonn
pedals, as the order has not yet been shipped.

Please confirm the cancellation and initiate a full refund to the original
payment method.


Order details:

Order number: #SSN1845

Order date: 25.07.2025

Name: Mark Klomfass


If you need any additional information from my side, feel free to let me
know.


Thank you for your support and understanding.


Kind regards,

Mark Klomfass




SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> schrieb am Mi. 25. Juni 2025 um 14:39:

> SIMSONN

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Klomfass,    Sorry for the delay, we were waiting for the shipment to arrive from our German warehouse. We were waiting for the shipment from the German warehouse to arrive before we shipped it to you. However, with the latest news that the shipment is not expected until Wednesday, we have shipped it to you today via UPS and it is expected to arrive for you on the 10th.

Dear Simsonn Team


Thank you for your message.


I’m a bit surprised to hear that the pedals have now been shipped, as I had
previously requested a cancellation. Could you please clarify whether the
pedals were originally supposed to be shipped from your German warehouse,
and whether the shipment is now coming from China instead?


If that is the case, I would unfortunately incur additional import duties,
which would be quite frustrating.


I’d appreciate a brief clarification regarding this situation.


Kind regards,


service@simsonn.com
